typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> rawHospitalAdmission
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> countryLookup
rawHospitalAdmission, countryLookup lookup(rawHospitalAdmission@country == countryLookup@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountryCode
LookupCountryCode split(indicator == 'Daily ICU occupancy' || indicator == 'Daily hospital occupancy',
	indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k*' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(DailyData, WeeklyData)
ConditionalSplit@DailyData select(mapColumn(
		country = ConditionalSplit@DailyData@country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		indicator,
		date,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily hospital occupancy', 'Daily ICU occupancy']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> countsDailyHospitalAndICU
countsDailyHospitalAndICU select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		Population = population,
		reported_date = date,
		hospital_occupancy_count = {Daily hospital occupancy_count},
		icu_occupancy_count = {Daily ICU occupancy_count},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSinkColumns
